Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: These reagents detect a 220 - kD protein localized in discrete nuclear foci in all epithelial cell lines , including those derived from breast malignancies .

Let's think step by step.

1. Epithelial cell lines: These are not diseases, but rather types of cells derived from tissues that line the surfaces of organs and glands in the body.
2. Breast malignancies: This refers to diseases that are malignant (cancerous) in nature and affect the breast tissue. In this context, the disease entities are "breast malignancies."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
